title: Poor System Worsens Ranked System - thoughts?
body:
I played a game today where our mid-laner disconnected 10 seconds after arriving onto the Rift. Now, because they D/C'd after already connecting, we could not remake, and so spend a grueling 15 min waiting to FF a brutal game. It was a waste of my valuable weekend, I work as a doctor, and hardly ever get enough time off for this type of thing. 
I think the game mechanics need to change in order to correct this. 
Here is my proposed fix:

if a player D/C's at any point BEFORE 5 min, a system vote goes out to all allied players whereby the majority can all vote to end the match. If this does happen, the D/C champion gets penalised HARD (ie -50 LP for example) in order to prevent intentional D/Cs. It shouldn't matter if the player has initially loaded in or not. 

Now some might argue, oh but what about connection issues? - tough, either sort the connection or don't play ranked, it really should be simple as that.

replies.body:
>I played a game today where our mid-laner disconnected 10 seconds after arriving onto the Rift.

Sorry bud but that isn't how the system works.

If a player is deemed AFK at any point before 1:30 (till 3 minutes)/before a kill is gotten, a remake is available.

it's sadder when you join back in after client crashes, jungle camps haven't even spawned and you'd only be a little late getting to toplane, where you're certain you'd still be fine, but you're confronted with the option to cast the 5th green vote, for a remake, where declining wouldn't even matter.

>jungle camps haven't even spawned

Also not possible, remakes are only possible at 3 minutes.
this was a while ago, before the remake timer was moved back.

Since when was it moved "back"?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ

This shows it still at 3 minutes, and i swear i had one at 3 minutes not even that long ago.

no I mean back when they were testing remake. Early iterations of the remake started at 1:30 in I believe, and sometimes it would bug out. I once had a game where nobody on our team had any trouble loading in, all in lanes, all accounted for, but we still had a remake vote.
